name: Tedram
description: Tedram is a simulation and casual game of a random guy that works in various jobs, that is between making pizzas, collect garbage, and restock the pizzeria with supplies. Between that you need to have the best strategy for the time you spend in each job, for that you have available various vehicles, between a car and, two trucks. At the same time you can deliver pizzas, but remember dont run out of stock, and try to make more money as possible and have fun.
